articles.description: Raghav Chadha and Parineeti Chopra took to Instagram to share pictures from their holiday in Austria and London. The couple had a 'cozy and warm' New Year celebration.
articles.content: Meanwhile, politician Raghav Chadha wrote, "She called me Santa, but its me who got the most wonderful present of all! Wishing you all a very Happy New Year, one filled with love, joy and peace (sic)… [+27 chars]
